reviewText: Examines the business of female companionship. NY is mentioned and footage of Elliot Spitzer appears. Mostly it is in Las Vegas. Interviews with police, gals in the business, a 911 call, and her failed attempts to get someone to talk to her. She goes undercover to get introduction information on the business. Cab drivers are quizzed and they have information. Insightful. Also see Whores' Glory.
Quite a documentary on global sexuality, not only in the US !
